short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract cookies into a curl compatible string

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple cookie editor that extracts cookies in a curl-compatible way, so you can extract cookies from a browser and paste them into the curl command line utility directly.
